data.title: Michael Peterson Music
data.text:
5/22/2024 - Are you ready for summer? This weeks "Have You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?" is "GIRL OF SUMMER" From the unreleased "IN BLACK" album, this song will help you get in the mood for a lounge chair, some grilling and a cold drink. Click the link to enjoy and share with your friends who are ready for some heat! Click here - https://soundcloud.com/michaelpetersonofficial/girl-of-summer

APRIL 16, 2024 - üòä Here is a candid clip from last nights California Hall of Fame induction ceremony where I was blessed to have been inducted along with entertainment royalty like Kasey Kasem, The Cowsills (The Flower Girl & Hair) Dennis Tufano of the Buckinghams (5 O'Clock World), Ron Dante of The Archies (Sugar Sugar), The Turtles (Happy Together), Gary Green (known as the Outlaw Folk-Singer), Frank Stallone (Two Kinds of Love & Sylvester's brother), Tony Valentino of The Standells, David Cassidy (I Think I Love You), Walter Egan (Magnet & Steel), Shadows of the Night (G.L.O.R.I.A. GLORIA) and so many others.

https://www.facebook.com/candykayne2/videos/930341178834650

APRIL 6, 2024 - THE PRICE OF ADMISSION

For those who understand or at the very least wrestle with the complexities of love and forgiveness, this weeks ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù is ‚ÄúThe Price of Admission.‚Äù Written by Jim Brown and Shane Decker, this song is a striking reminder that sometimes the hardest lessons come at the highest price.

Click the link below to listen and share it.

https://soundcloud.com/michaelpetersonofficial/the-price-of-admission

#EmotionalJourney #ShareTheMusic #ThePriceOfAdmission

FEBRUARY 18, 2024 - Here‚Äôs some EXTRA FUN news‚Ä¶I am being inducted into the California Music Hall Of Fame along with:

- BB KING

- CASEY CASEM

- WALTER EGAN (singer of ‚ÄúMagnet & Steel‚Äù)

- JIMI JAMISON (lead singer of the rock band ‚ÄúSurvivor‚Äù)

- DAVID CASSIDY

- CHERIE CURRIE (lead singer of the rock band ‚ÄúThe Runaways‚Äù

- BOB EUBANKS (Radio DJ, host of The Newlywed Game)

The ceremony is on April 14 in Temecula, CA. There will be several live performances by inductees with a great band. I will be singing ‚ÄúFrom Here to Eternity‚Äù

Previous inductees include

- MERRILEE RUSH (singer of ‚ÄúAngel of the Morning‚Äù)

- CAROLE KAYE (Iconic studio bass player for The Wrecking Crew)

- MICKEY DOLENZ (The Monkees)

- RICHIE FURAY (Poco)

- CANNED HEAT

- JAN & DEAN

- LITTLE FEAT

- BOBBY KIMBALL (Lead singer of the rock band TOTO)

- GARY PUCKETT

FEBRUARY 15, 2024 - This weeks ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù is ‚ÄúSTONES.‚Äù From skipping stones as kids to offering stones in a tiny velvet box during a proposal, STONES show up in our lives‚Ä¶all through our lives.From the unreleased ‚ÄúIn Black‚Äù cd, this classic was written by Jimbeau Hinson, Kim Tribble and Jon Michaels. Immerse yourself in the soulful recording of "Stones" and share this touching ballad with your loved ones. Pave the way to more heartfelt connections with ‚ÄúSTONES‚Äù.

Click this link to enjoy and share - https://soundcloud.com/michaelpetersonofficial/stones to

JANUARY 5, 2024 - Happy New Year!!! Have you ever wondered if love can conquer all? Me too. I couldn't help but think about my parents and a few moments in my own life when I was recording this song. So emotional. Wow. This weeks ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù is "Only Time Will Tell." If you are feeling like quitting on yourself right now...I encourage you to never give up. The future holds beauty and peace for us all. Click here to listen and share with those you know can relate to this story - Click here to listen and share

DECEMBER 6, 2023 - CONGRATULATIONS FRANKIE MORENO! Your "Christmas Duets" album just reached #1 on iTunes. WooHoo. And additional exciting news...our single "Merry Christmas From a Million Miles Away" reached #3. If you'd like to enjoy a copy of this fantastic album (even if I do say so mys...ELF hahaha..BIG SMILE!) you can easily find it on iTunes. Look for "Christmas Duets" by Frankie Moreno on iTunes.

NOVEMBER 31, 2023 - I have never done a deep dive on the Spotify or YouTube numbers for "Drink Swear Steal & Lie" or "From Here To Eternity" before today. Thanks to my friend Crystal-lee Horton-Young for sharing this Spotify page with me. I had no idea there were so many streams. A few months ago a friend of mine at BMI told me the following: If you assume average song length is 3:30, any given song would have to be played continuously for six years to reach one million airplays. As far as I can tell from looking at YouTube, Spotify and traditional radio airplay combined, "Drink Swear Steal & Lie" and "From Here To Eternity" have been played over 26 and a half million times in the past 27 years. I feel so very grateful to all of you who have listened to my music and have written notes to me over the years to let me know what these songs have meant to you. From the bottom of my heart I thank you.

NOVEMBER 18, 2023 - NEW MUSIC COMING ON iTUNES DECEMBER 3rd

I am excited to let you know I have a new single coming December 3rd. The original song titled ‚ÄúMERRY CHRISTMAS FROM A MILLION MILES AWAY‚Äù is a duet featuring me with 5-time Las Vegas ‚ÄúEntertainer of the Year‚Äù Frankie Moreno.

The album ‚ÄúFRANKIE MORENO: CHRISTMAS DUETS‚Äù features duets with Frankie Moreno (www.FrankieMoreno.com ) and several well-known stars including: Crystal Gayle, Five For Fighting and Graham Russell of Air Supply to name a few. Stay tuned for more exciting details! You can go to the iTunes Store and pre order yours right now!!!

NOVEMBER 16, 2023 - This week‚Äôs ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù is ‚ÄúI REMEMBER AMERICA.‚Äù Written by the late great John Stewart, this song encapsulates the essence of an era I and the friends I grew up with hold dear. I realize that many Americans did not experience all of the ideals in this song. I wish they had, and I believe they deserve to in the future. In that spirit I offer this song. These ideals and memories deserve to be heard and shared. Click here to listen and share: Click here to listen and share

AN INVITATION TO DEEP CONNECTION

OCTOBER 9, 2023 - This weeks ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù is from Michael‚Äôs previously unreleased ‚ÄúIn Black‚Äù album. The songs title ‚ÄúIF YOU‚ÄôRE WILLING‚Äù puts into words what is sometimes hard to say. Thank you for giving it a listen. If you can think of any one you know who might be touched or helped by this song right now, please feel free to share it. Let's spread the healing power of music together. Click the link to enjoy and share ‚Äì Click here to enjoy and share.

#DeepLove #IfYoureWilling #MusicHeals

SEPTEMBER 8, 2023 - We all have a valuable story to tell. What is yours? Occasionally you may get the chance to share your story in a way that is intended to encourage people who are interested. I had that privilege a few weeks ago. You will find the interview below as it appears in the latest publication by NACCE. (The National Association of Community College Entrepreneurship) - Click on the article to enlarge it.

JULY 24, 2023 - "This week's featured 'Have You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?' is none other than 'IF MY MEMORY SERVES ME WELL.‚Äù Written by Michael Peterson, James LeBlanc, and Walt Aldridge, this song will transport you back to those unforgettable nights that played a crucial role in shaping the person you are today. Write a brief note here telling a special story this song reminded you about. Click here to turn the spotlight on your own memories that matter. Share this song with the friends who shared those magical nights with you.

This weeks ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson song?‚Äù is ROME BURNS. This lyric came to me in a dream. I woke up and wrote it down word for word. Several years later during a songwriting retreat in the south of France, the music showed up through the brilliance of Pat McDonald and Darrell Brown. This was in 1999. The song seems more poignant than ever. This recording is from an unreleased project I recorded for SONY titled ‚ÄúModern Man.‚Äù Click this link to listen and then share if you like. Click here to listen and share

#PowerfulLyrics #TimeForChange #Inspiration #TogetherWeCanMakeADifference

JUNE 15, 2023 - This weeks ‚ÄúHave you heard this Michael Peterson song?‚Äù is: The Warrior's Anthem (I Am an American)

Commissioned by the U.S. Army and written by Michael Peterson and Josh Leo, this powerful anthem of bravery and dedication, embodies the spirit of American soldiers. Together, let's honor the unyielding spirit of the American Soldier. Click, listen, and share the link below:

Click here to enjoy and share

#WarriorsAnthem #IAmAnAmerican #ProudSoldier #LandOfTheFree #UnitedWeStand #LibertysChampion #PatrioticSpirit

JUNE 1, 2023 - Looking for a fresh, fun, and romantic way to say, "I love you, and I always will"? Don't miss out on this week's ‚ÄúHave you heard this Michael Peterson song?‚Äù It is called ‚ÄúI Wanna Be with You When You Look Like That." Click here to enjoy! this previously unreleased recording. Share it with that special someone in your life! üé∂

APRIL 12 ‚Äì 16, 2023 ‚Äì The National Veterans Creative Arts Festival is in St Louis, MO this year. This spectacular annual event is the culmination of a year-long competition sponsored by the Department of Veterans Affairs and the American Legion Auxiliary. Now in its 51st year, this event began with over 4000 entries from 180 V.A. Medical centers. Winning entries were then entered into the regional competition from which 120 gold medal winners were chosen. The event is filmed for broadcast on PBS during the week of Veterans Day each year. Michael Peterson has been the Master of Ceremonies for this event for the past 12-years. Previous emcees include Ernest Borgnine, Dr Joyce Brothers, Bo Derek and Jane Powell.

APRIL 3, 2023 - Imagine a couple who got married to the song ‚ÄúFrom Here to Eternity‚Äù. Perhaps you were one of them. Now imagine the same couple several years into their marriage. Right now they need a different kind of love song. This weeks ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù is their new song. "SOMETIMES LOVE." Please feel free to share with a friend. Click on the link and let the music speak to your heart. Click here for more

MARCH 27, 2023 - This week‚Äôs ‚ÄúHave you Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù is ‚ÄúThe Warriors Anthem.‚Äù Written by Michael Peterson & Josh Leo, this song is a musical version of the U.S. Army "Soldier‚Äôs Creed." If you have family or friends who have served in the U.S. Military they will really appreciate this music video. Click the following link to watch the video. Please feel free to share the link. God bless the men and women and families who serve in our military. Click here to be inspired

FEBRUARY 28, 2023 - WHAT SHOULD I DO WITH MY LIFE? Life can be exciting. And we also face moments where we're unsure of what to do next. If you're going through one of these experiences right now this song could help you find hope in the midst of your current uncertainty. If you know someone who could benefit from hearing this today, please share the link with them. Let's spread hope and encouragement to those who need it most. Remember, the answer to "What should I do with my life?" may be closer than you think. Click here to enjoy

FEBRUARY 16, 2023 - Know someone who could really use a song to help them move on from a past love? Check out this week's "Have You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?" It's called "I Cut Myself Off at the Past," and it's sure to hit you and them in the feels. Click the link below to listen, share it with a friend, and let me know what you think!

Click here to experience this song

FEBRUARY 4, 2023 - "A Song of Hope for Those Who Ache for Redemption"

If someone you love is struggling emotionally after making some regrettable choices, may this recording of ‚ÄúI Hope They‚Äôre Wrong‚Äù be a touching reminder that there is still hope, no matter how hard it may seem right now. Feel free to share it with them.

Written by Michael and the late Scott English (‚ÄúMandy‚Äù , ‚ÄúBend Me, Shape Me‚Äù) this song which was recorded for a special promotional project Michael created for the New Holland Tractor company. It has never been commercially released.

Click the link now to experience and share the feeling. Click here to experience the feeling

JANUARY 22, 2023 - This week‚Äôs ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson song?‚Äù is ‚ÄúI‚ÄôD LOVE TO FEEL THAT WAY AGAIN.‚Äù Click the link below to step into the musical time machine that is this demo from an unreleased album. Relive some of the fun, if not crazy experiences you have had during your one wild and precious life. Click here to enjoy.

JANUARY 11, 2023 - Are you ready for a classic love song written by Michael Peterson and Robert Ellis Orrall that will have you feeling all kinds of romantic? It's a true love song for the ages, and I guarantee it will have you feeling all the feels. Click below and together let's get swept up in the magic of love."

Click here to enjoy!

DECEMBER 28, 2022 - Do you know someone who would benefit from hearing a song that speaks to the universal struggles of being human and trying to fit in? If so, you won't want to miss this week‚Äôs ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù: Being Human. Click the link below to give it a listen, and then help spread the message of understanding and compassion by sharing it with a friend this holiday season. Click here

#overcomingdepression #loneliness

DECEMBER 1, 2022 - Over the years, some people have asked me ‚ÄúHave you ever recorded a follow up to ‚ÄòFrom Here to Eternity?‚Äù They told me they would like a song that would be about the same couple a few years into their marriage. This week‚Äôs ‚ÄúHave You Heard This Michael Peterson Song?‚Äù is that song.

Co-written with my producers Robert Ellis Orrall and Josh Leo, the song ‚ÄúBefore Another Day Goes By‚Äù was a hidden track on the ‚ÄúBeing Human‚Äù album. As a result, some of you may have missed this‚Ä¶until now.

Please click the link below to give it a listen

https://soundcloud.com/michaelpetersonofficial

AUGUST 1, 2022 - Every once in awhile you meet a special person...who is super talented and a thoughtful difference maker in the lives of others.

Yona Marie is one of those people. - Please enjoy this musical example of her gift and her heart. Click here to listen

ALSO - If you are interested in songwriting...check out her blog...LOTS of helpful resources there! - Click here for songwriting resources

How 'bout we shine more light on this deserving young talent!!!!

Michael

JULY 4, 2022 - This recording and song began as an acclaimed poem written by renowned American poet JoAnna O'Keefe

Recognized for it's timeless truth and passion, her poem "AMERICA AT THE CROSSROADS" has won many national poetry awards and was read into the U.S. Congressional record by U.S. Senator Bill Nelson.

In 2019 this award-winning poem became the song ‚ÄúAMERICA AT THE CROSSROADS.‚Äù With the final words co-written by JoAnna O'Keefe, the late Tony Smith and Michael Peterson.

The timeless message and invitation of this lyric are particularly poignant right now. It is our fervent hope that this recording and video will help to stir the soul of patriotic Americans to unite.

There are many things that can improve here in the U.S. but there is nothing wrong with our nation that cannot be healed by what is right and good about America.

Click here to see the video and hear this song

God bless America.

JUNE 21, 2022 - Do you know that moment when the bartender says "You don't have to go home, but you can't stay here." This song is about that. Hahaha!

Written by Michael Peterson and Ashe Underwood, this weeks: Have you heard this Michael Peterson song? is "Please, Tell Me What You've Got In Mind."

Click here to enjoy!

JUNE 7, 2022 - This week's "Have You Heard This Michael Peterson song?" is THE PERFECT WEEKEND - This is a PARTY SONG on behalf of all who are ready to cut loose following a break up. This might not mean much to you right now, but someday it could mean everything. LOL! To listen - Click the link below.

Click her to enjoy

APRIL 27, 2022 -The National Veterans Creative Arts Festival is the Department of Veterans Affairs premier national arts therapy event. Each year thousands of Veterans submit their art in the competition and over 100 gold medals are given to the top artists. The whole event is captured and broadcast on PBS yearly. This year marks the 11th year Michael and Jill have supported this extraordinary event. Here is a clip of Michael‚Äôs performance to close the stage show in St Petersburg, Florida.

Click here to enjoy

APRIL 25, 2022 - This week's installment in the new series I call "HAVE YOU HEARD THIS?" features the demo of a song called "I Hope You Know What You're Doing." Here is a line from the song:

"I hope you know what you're doing. I'm starting to believe there's more to love than losing."

Love is a complicated experience and this song captures a piece of that "certain uncertainty" about as good as any I ever had a hand in writing.

I wrote this with Keifer Thompson of the country duo Thompson Square.

Click below to enjoy!

Click here to enjoy

APRIL 13, 2022 - I am beginning a new series I call "HAVE YOU HEARD THIS?" Every other week I will post a song from my catalog you may not be familiar with.

This is "BABY, I'M STICKIN WITH YOU." I began this track in Italy after listening to Stevie Wonders "Higher Ground." It occurred to me I had never heard a country song with that groove. I asked the great Daryl Burgess to help me finish it. Click below to enjoy the finished song.

Click here to enjoy

APRIL 12, 2022 -For the past 11 years Jill and I have been serving the Institute For Veterans and Military Families (IVMF) out of Syracuse University. They have a variety of programs focused on raising up military veteran entrepreneurs. This past weekend they held their 24th V-WISE (Veteran Women Igniting the Spirit of Entrepreneurship) conference. This time it was in Nashville. TN. This is my 22nd and Jill‚Äôs 23rd time to participate. Jill is the emcee for the opening ceremonies and a clinical on health and wellness. In addition to my music performance I help to create branding, programming. I also offer business coaching for attendees interested in a music career.

Here is a great clip about the program:

Click here to view

March 21, 2022 - We are so pleased to let everyone know that Michael has been selected to receive the prestigious ‚ÄúSpecial Recognition of Champions Award‚Äù during the annual Army Women‚Äôs Hall of Fame Induction ceremony in Ft Belvoir, Virginia. The ‚ÄúSpecial Recognition of Champions Award‚Äù is presented to individuals who have made exceptional contributions supporting women in the Army or the Armed Forces.

In receiving this award, Michael and Jill are the first married couple to both be inducted in the Army Women‚Äôs Hall of Fame.

Please click the link below to learn more about the ceremony or the Army Women‚Äôs Foundation:

Click here

MARCH 15, 2022 - This weeks video features highlights from the three decades I have had the privilege of serving High School and Jr High School students around the world.

Some of you know this, many do not...I lost my birth father and my adopted father in violent shooting incidents when I was a teen. It profoundly impacted my life.

One of the positive outcomes of those difficult days is that I really have a heart for students and a desire to encourage them as they work through their own challenges. This video shows a brief overview of that part of my life's journey so far. Enjoy.

Three Decades Serving Students - Click here

MARCH 1, 2022 - This weeks "Music You Might Not Have Heard Before" feature is ‚ÄúGood Time Charlie‚Äôs Got The Blues‚Äù. Here‚Äôs the story behind this video clip:

In 2018, I was invited to perform at the Pure Country music festival in Wolsztyn Poland backed by the fantastic European Union Band.

Founded by Magdalena ≈Åuszczynska and Polish country music icon Michael Lonstar, this Festival is one of Europe's premiere country music showcases.

Here is one of my favorite musical moments of the evening: Danny O'Keefe's timeless classic "Good Time Charlie's Got The Blues".

Click here to watch this performance

FEBRUARY 15, 2022 - This weeks "Music You Might Not Have Heard Before" feature is "72 Camaro".

I co-wrote this with Larry King, Joie Scott and Michael Thompson. "72 Camaro" was first released as a promotional video for HEAR Technologies during a recent NAMM show. This recording was ultimately released by the band Soliel Moon on Frontiers Records.

BIG THANKS to Joie Scott for introducing me to Larry King and for inviting me to join them on this writing session.

What a thrill to have this all star band (including a musical hero of mine Leland Sklar on Bass) playing on this recording. Wow!

Enjoy.

JANUARY 31, 2022 - #2 in the new video series I call "Something You Might Not Have Seen Before"

‚ÄúI‚Äôm A Soldier‚Äù

Written by then U.S. Army Sergeant's First Class Howard Smith and Howie John LaMirande, this recording was commissioned by the Army Office Of Strategic Communications. The head of that office at the time was a Colonel named Jill Willig Chambers. Yep. This was our first project together. BIG SMILE!

Produced by Josh Leo, the song and video were used for years by the Army at special events and the recording was featured on the U.S. Army field bands CD release "CALL TO DUTY".

Enjoy.

JANUARY 18, 2022 - To kick off the new year I am launching a new video series where every two weeks I will post a music video of mine you may not have seen before. These will be rare clips from TV shows, live concerts and performance videos.

Here is the first: "I Remember America".

This timeless classic was written by the great John Stewart (Daydream Believer, Kingston Trio)

This version, with my updated lyric, is from my debut indie album on Beyond Records titled "In Black."

The song was used by the American Legion as part of a national fund raising campaign for "The American Legacy Scholarship fund". For nearly ten years I had the privilege of serving as the national spokesperson for this initiative aimed at ensuring children of fallen service members a tuition free college education.

Enjoy.

JIM STEVENS: U.S. Military Veteran ‚Äì A bullet fragment (A souvenir he brought home from Vietnam) suddenly shifted in his skull. He, immediately and permanently lost his peripheral vision. Such an occurrence would have immediately put an end to most artist‚Äôs careers. But Jim isn‚Äôt like most artists. He found a way to adapt.. Using special lenses combined with his extraordinary sense of touch, he invented to entirely new painting techniques. He used those techniques to capture me in this portrait. The painting appears to shift and transform as the viewer moves.

You can win this portrait at no cost BUT if you want to make a donation to help Veteran artists continue their use of art to find healing you can also make a donation when you register for the drawing. Register now: Click here to register the drawing

NOV 1, 2021 - I am happy to share that I will be performing a live show at Mandalay Bay Hotel & Casino Dec 9, 2021 at 8:00 p.m. I will be joining two other hit songwriters as a part of the acoustic NASHVILLE UNPLUGGED concert series during National Finals Rodeo week. This is my first live performance since February 28, 2020. I‚Äôm stoked! Please come out and join us at this free show.

OCTOBER 19, 2021 - Did you know that Michael and Jill wrote a children‚Äôs book with world renowned Author/Illustrator Guy Gilchrist? It is called ‚ÄúLittle IsGood‚Äù. It follows the wild adventures of a pre-schooler navigating the big world around her as she celebrates being "Little". This book is FABULOUS and will be a great Christmas gift for your children, grandchildren, nieces and nephews. To order, e-mail Jill at: MovingPeople@yahoo.com They are only $10.00 (and this includes the shipping) You‚Äôre gonna love gifting this book! AND...100% of the proceeds go to helping Veterans with Post Traumatic Stress.

OCTOBER 11, 2021 - FUNNY YOU SHOULD ASK is Michael‚Äôs podcast featuring classic hits, comedy bits and touches of inspiration. Twice a month you can stream a new episode beginning Thursdays after 10:00 a.m. Pacific. The show usually features classic hits across all genre‚Äôs. This weeks episode features (by request) Michael‚Äôs hits and some unreleased gems. Share the show with a friend. They‚Äôll thank you for it!

Here is a link to the shows: Positive Listening Radio

OCT 1, 2021 - PORTRAITS HELPING HEROES - This portrait was created by world class portrait artist Jim Stevens. What makes this portrait so unique is that Jim is legally blind. It is so well done you's swear it was a print of a photograph. It is not.

The artist is also a military Veteran and the Commander /Executive Director of the Veterans of Foreign Wars, Post 1 & Veterans Arts Council in Denver Colorado.

PORTRAITS HELPING HEROES is an initiative designed to raise money to support launching therapeutic Veterans Arts programs around the country. To learn more and see the portrait more clearly please visit https://go.rallyup.com/vfwpost1-michael.../Campaign/Details

While you are there you can register to be the winner of this one of a kind portrait.

Please take a moment and visit the site - https://go.rallyup.com/vfwpost1-michael.../Campaign/Details

Thank you for supporting therapeutic art programs for Veterans.

AUG 27, 2021 - The Commander and Executive Director of VFW Post 1 in Denver Colorado, Jim Stevens is partnering with Michael Peterson to launch the national ‚ÄúPortraits Helping Heroes‚Äù campaign. The goal is to establish a Veterans Arts Council Chapter in VFW Posts across the country, resulting in more opportunities for wounded Veterans to enhance their healing process using art therapy.

The campaign partners with well known, patriotic musicians and performers. A unique portrait of each performer (Michael being the first) is created by renowned artist Jim Stevens.

Each portrait will be given to one lucky winner of a random ticket drawing. There is no purchase required to enter the drawing but it is hoped that those who register for the drawing will make a donation while they are on the site registering for the drawing. Stay tuned for more details on this innovative campaign.
